Go look at all the dorms in the Projection Device - the map of the students round on the homepage can help you figure out which buildings are dorms. Does any of them look like someone is trying to encode something on it?
Each letter of the answer is encoded in a different place on the dorm. You'll need to reorder them by paint color.
The encodings used are: Morse, Pigpen, Semaphore, Braille, and None.
